desc: We use only natural ingredients and fragrances in our cremes. Our products are of the highest concentration, as they contain no water, and they have a pure, natural base of coconut oil, almond oil, beeswax and Aloe Vera. We use no artificial color, no animal testing, and no preservatives. Made in Hawaii.

layout.text: LUSCIOUS SCENTED BODY CREMES IN TIMELESS, COLLECTABLE, HANDMADE POTTERY JARS. Cruelty-free, No Polypropylene, No Methalparaben, No Sodium Laurel Sulphate. Only five simple natural ingredients.
